color.div:
Ashimites are deer-like animals which reside in the cold and snowy climates of the
5th Layer. They used to be found roaming the grassy plains of the 4th Layer, but it seems they got forced to migrate to survive. :hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Behaviour Details: The Ashimites can be mounted but will usually flee from any and all Delvers. On their own, they do not pose much of a threat to Delvers. However, if they are with their back leader, Delvers are advised to stay far away.
:hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Item Drops: If one slays an Ashimites be sure to collect its
hoofs and
antlers, as these are highly sought after by Orths elite. In addition to this, their
meat is known to be quite tasty. Their hoofs can also be quite used as flint to start fires in the cold. :hypers:
